message: Let's make a deal Bob. I get $60, you get $40. It's a good deal for both of us, especially considering the inflation!
I think we can both do better. I'll take $55 and you can have $45.  Let's split it a little more evenly, considering the inflation will be hitting you harder than me.
Okay Bob, let's be real.  The inflation is working against you faster. I'll take $55, you take $45. It's better than what you'll get in another round.
